Zena Howard FAIA bụ onye Amerịka na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ nke lekọtara ọtụtụ ọrụ dị elu, gụnyere imewe nke National Museum of African American History and Culture in Washington, DC and the International Civil Rights Center and Museum in Greensboro, North Carolina.
Howard nwetara nzere bachelọ nke sayensị na ihe owuwu na Mahadum Virginia.

Howard bụ onye isi na onye isi nchịkwa na Perkins+Will na Durham, North Carolina. Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Onye isi Project Manager maka imewe nke National Museum of African American History and Culture, International Civil Rights Center na Museum na Greensboro, North Carolina, na mmụba nke Motown Museum na Detroit, Michigan.
Howard bụ onye guzobere Kọmitii Global Diversity and Inclusion nke ụlọ ọrụ ya ma na-etinye aka na ọrụ na atụmatụ ndị na-achọ ịbawanye ọnụ ọgụgụ ụmụ nwanyị na ndị na-emepụta ihe owuwu.
